comments.commentBody: Australia is laughing too, just FYI.  The ridicule is not confined to the northern hemisphere.
I fully expect our so-called president will soon transition directly from the Oval Office to a padded cell. He is clearly unhinged and by any measure unfit to serve.
The Republican party needs to bite the bullet and impeach 45.

After tax cuts perhaps; the messiness of impeachment must take second seat. Mike Pence is more their "type" anyway but he'll have to pace the halls until the plutocrats get another slice of the pie and the GOP then poses as "responsible" adherents of the Constitution.
I believe it. I think they did it.
Who is they?
If by "they" you mean the FBI, then yes, they did. Obama? No.

"Without offering any evidence or providing the source of his information, Mr. Trump fired off a series of Twitter messages alleging that Mr. Obama “had my ‘wires tapped,’ ” and he compared the professed activities to “Watergate/Nixon” and “McCarthyism.”

It is pretty obvious that Trump is trying to deflect this week's earlier news story about the Obama administration securing and preserving intelligence which occurred between the Trump camp and the Russians with these pathetic allegations that Obama tapped his phones. Oh please, really? Every week since Trump's first day in office has resulted in something going awry or embarrassing or potentially illegal with one member or another of his cabinet.
I have become completely tapped out on this president, HIS ridiculous allegations and delusions. My brain is frying faster from his nonsense than Coronal Sanders can do a bucket of chicken. Enough already!!!
I read the article and I think trump is unhinged

I have been of the mindset that Trump had a preciously fragile ego, and still feel that way.

He is obviously a narcissist, potentially worse.

But with all this scattershot behavior, wild tweeting and accusations, I am also of the mindset that he must be suffering from something else. Dementia? A paranoid or delusional disorder?

He just does not have a what could be reasonably called a grasp on reality.

Or maybe he is just suffering from massive fear and guilt about what could be potentially exposed.

Whatever the reason, I deeply miss the integrity and dignity of President Obama.
Republicans continue to flaunt their PhDs and Black Belts in Psychological Projection.

She does not "have" to follow your advice. There is always more than one path to a solution, except for progressives who argue that their way is the only way.

If the health clinics are concerned about women's health, they can spin off the abortion services.

Elective abortions are no different from cosmetic surgery, and are legal. That does not mean that taxpayers are obligated to pay for them, or to subsidize abortion clinics.

If liberals want to support abortion clinics, let them make personal charitable contributions rather than attempting to force the unwilling to support their cause.

@Mark Thomason:  No one detected "a more offensive fraud."  That false narrative was foisted upon them by people like you.  Now we have the worst president in US history.  Time for you to "own it."  And take your sanctimony with you.

Stop reading NYT, WaPo, watching CNN (although CNN seemed to pull back and get a little more professional yesterday). Read international news sources (No, not just the Guardian), use google translate if you have to. Look at some conservative and not Total Resistance to Trump sites. You'll get out of the nightmare. It won't get you out of the reality, though.
Yep, projection you see all what you are in other persons! Mostly all the bad dark side. Like a mirror. Thats the reason he always looks so afraid and angry and thin skin.
Trump has become Wile E. Coyote in free fall over the cliff heading for a dusty crash next to a dried up river in an empty desert.

Wile E. Coyote, except for one notable reality---when a cartoon character "dies," he gets up, brushes off the dust, and continues the chase. When the Trumpet loses his wind, maybe he'll be done for good, never to be heard from again. We can dream, can't we?

Display your flag upside down or at half staff. This country is in deep__________
I would rather have President Coyote than this utter fool.

Too broad in your characterization. The Americans who fell for Trump were naive. The Americans who continue to support him are stupid. There are also a heck of a lot of us who never fell for him and our opinion of him has not changed one bit. We are not stupid, but we are feeling powerless because our Republican elected officials are asleep at the wheel.
Twitter allows so many characters to be typed. Kind of hard to explain it right there. This is Obama we're talking about. He will still say Benghazi was caused by a YouTube video.

@Mike - Are you serious? There's no explanation for these allegations because tweets are limited in length? This man is the president. I believe he can command a microphone and speak at length about any topic he chooses. But don't hold your breath...

People who subscribe to your way of thinking are why our country is saddled by a man as nefarious as Trump.

Excerpts from Barack Obama's third or fourth autobiographies:
''No, I didn't have all those guns walked into Mexico! That was somebody else's fault!''
''Iraq was stable in 2009, and that was Bush's fault, TOO!''
''Of course we set 5 Middle Eastern countries on fire. I didn't like any of those leaders!''
comments.userLocation: Fair Verona where we lay our scene

comments.commentBody: False no proof accusations have been leveled at Trump for the past 2 months.  What makes this any difference? Let's roll on this. Obama is squarely behind this Trump onslaught.

What in the world are you talking about?   You and Donald  are alleging as "fact" something that is completely unproven and has no evidence behind it.  You are taking it further and speculating that "no evidence was found".  Why not talk about the National Security agencies under the Obama Administration going before the special Judges to obtain a warrant for these wiretaps with a solid showing of Probable Cause that Trump Campaign was engaged in criminal activity.  That is the only way a wire tap would have been authorized.  And you would be getting creepy or perhaps you  watch too much TV to think Obama could have hired someone to place a wire tap on Trump Towers.  That happens in TV shows, perhaps, not in the United States.

Excellent idea !! We should know the details of the health plan available to congressional members - I suspect they spent a great deal of time and recruited numerous experts to create the perfect policy. If we, the people like what we see, then we just contact our representatives/senators and tell them we want what they have and it will be easy!!! The details have already been worked out. After all, congress represents us & we are no different from them, right ????

Oh, silly me - that won't work !! There is a "yuge" difference between the congress people and the citizens they supposedly represent ... the insurance companies TAKE money from constituents but they GIVE money to our elected officials via campaign contributions. Duh! No wonder we, the people can't get the same deal. As long as insurance companies are paying the people in charge of making policy, the people will never be represented fairly.
Forrest Trump.   The end.

Once again Mr. Kristof you're singing to the choir who fully support your position although are pulling our increasingly grey hairs out one at a time over every inhumane position that the Trump presidency has put forth.  The point is that Trump doesn't concern himself with "women's (or girl's in this case) issues which he made a point of delegating to his self promoting brand obsessed daughter, Ivanka.  In case you didn't notice, the President is only concerned with the health & fate of fellow billionaires therefore he panders to the Conservative right wing supporters who have made a deal with the Devil in order to have a President who will support their agenda.  This is why when he gives promises about not allowing any Americans to die in the street, out of the other side of his mouth he approves of repealing & replacing the ACA which will eventually drastically reduced Medicaid payments by capping them & replacing subsidies for low income people (under $50-60k income sliding scale) with tax credits & health savings accounts (for taxpayers earning over $80k/year).  This strategy is purposeful as he has literally written off low income people as those that either don't vote or worse, vote Democratic.  This cold hearted GOP strategy that caters to upper middle class to billionaire classes has written off the less fortunate as takers or those disabled kids who will be turned away from private religious schools thus warehoused in increasingly underfunded public schools.

Social security is an entitlement, one you are entitled to because you earned it with your contributions. In the same way, if you go into a store and pay for a shirt, you are then entitled to that shirt -- it becomes and entitlement.

Same with Medicare and other "entitlements."
Yep, they are eating the billionaires alive!
To a person who grew up in a country with much less money and resources but nonetheless  with a decent working health care system  everybody uses all the time, all of this turmoil is beyond surreal.
Better look under the rug, Bing.  All that looks free isn't necessarily free . . .
I love your system - the most humane I've ever seen up close.  Too bad we didn't pass it back when Roosevelt held the tiller of this old 'boat . . .'
